column2: ccordingly, a protracted absence of Eastern European travellers, especially from Russia
and Ukraine is to be anticipated given the nature of crisis in Ukraine and its current and
future implications.  The market share of Russia and Ukraine out of total arrivals for year
2019 was 6.3 % while the market share for 2021 was 12.2%. Therefore, it is high time to
diversify the markets and concentrate on new primary and potential markets   with larger
economies, large outbound populations and high yield.
